segments.text: Ugh, this kitchen is turning into a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is spewing water all over, what a sloppy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman just stands there, oblivious with her wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is gross, spreading filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets dripping, probably ruining the wood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, filthy hands in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is teetering, covered in who knows what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl reaching up, begging for stolen sweets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats like little thieves in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is clean, unlike this pigsty inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked, towel bunchedâ€”everything's a clutter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the carelessness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the water, you fools!
segments.speaker: PAR
